result.title: Math.pow() in java ?
result.content: Hello Codeforces community ! Suppose I have declared a variable long cnt=0; //then I wish to do cnt+=Math.pow(2,59); //And again I do cnt+=Math.pow(2,3); Ideally now value should be cnt + 8 but value output by compiler is still cnt i.e. 8 is notincremented but if I parse that second statement somewhat like cnt+=(long)Math.pow(2,3); I am getting the desired answer .Would someone mind explaining it what'sthe difference here! Any help will be appreciated ! Thanx !.
